channel.title: Homepage on Rosehip Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Rosehip Studio

item.title: Custom Software
item.description: Rosehip Studio is working on products in the food and design industries to help make data easier to understand and share. Working! Rosehip Studio’s first product jumps into the realm of software that connects and clarifies people’s food preferences. Get in Touch Please get in touch if you’d like to collaborate! We’re interested in design and technology that: Actually solves a problem Changes the world for the better Has minimal impact on the environment Is functional and beautiful

item.title: Lorraine Sawicki
item.description: Passionate about the food industry and advocate for data privacy, as a designer and software developer Lorraine is leading the way to help share food preferences and allergies between individuals and businesses.

item.title: Maven
item.description: As the committed guardian of our home office, Maven is skilled at loud barking and vigorous tail swishing.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Let’s get in touch! Name Email Message Send

item.title: Subscribe to Rosehip Studio
item.description: Lorraine dishes info on her mission to help you eat better with others. Become more creative and more productive with your food choices and compatibility. Join our growing community and receive one weekly email. No spam, ever.
